summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the east 1/2 of Block 5, less north 91.05' and west 1/2 of Block 5 less north 157.05, University Lake Shore Park Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-425 and 17-310 respectively.
